fields.label: Equipment Access
fields.value: Barbell, Dumbbells, Bands, Med Balls, Sled

fields.label: Any injuries or areas you need to work around?
fields.value: My knee, I’m coming back from ACL. Need to rebuild stability, confidence and lateral movement.

fields.label: What are your key performance goals?
fields.value: Power & Explosiveness, Mobility, Grappling, Injury Prevention, Mental Resilience

fields.label: Where do you feel weakest right now?
fields.value: Knees, Posterior Chain, Lateral Movement, CNS Fatigue, Coordination / Proprioception, Core Stability

fields.label: Do you prefer certain training styles?
Do you struggle with any mental blockers or mindset challenges?
Are there any parts of your previous plan you hated or loved?
fields.value: Hated how unbalanced the rehab was (too general). Loved band-resisted sled work and contrast sets.
